subtitle.text: If you add CSS from "Settings" in the upper right corner, you will be able to You can toggle enable/disable in real time.
This is the filtering that will be set for all timelines
Can control various items other than notes

MoreSetting.text: Hide the number: following and follower
Make space for pinned posts smaller
Open settings in the side panel

Description.text:
Hides notes/notifications that match any of the following criteria

„ÉªMore than four mentions are included
„ÉªMentions of the initial icon
„ÉªThe postings of the initial icon user on an external server

Converts the input name pictogram to "‚ô•"
Example: :send_money:, :igyo:, :todays_break:

Completely obscures the emoji of the name entered.
(Even from emoji pickers!)
Example: :send_money:, :igyo:, :todays_break:

You can also set the accounts you want to display
when you set "Hide Bot."
News, government, and disaster management accounts
can be displayed,
allowing you to keep the information you need visible

Hides all notes by the specified user.
Please enter userID.
(separated by , if there are multiple users)
Example: ikakonbu, syuilo, abc123

Hides renotes by the specified user.
Please enter userID.
(separated by , if there are multiple users)
Example: ikakonbu, syuilo, abc123

Change the display format of the emoji picker.
Makes it easier to select horizontal emojis.

Make the button to hide the image larger.
This makes it easier to press.

I'm going to make it so that users' pinned notes
are side by side so that they don't overwhelm the pinned notes.
It's going to be a little inconvenient when viewing pinned notes,
but forgive me.

I'll make the post screen bigger since it's so small.
It's convenient to be able to see all the long notes.

This extension allows you to display a badge indicating
that "filtering is now active".
This setting allows you to specify which categories
should be included in the badge

When you open this settings window,
it identifies the timeline which currently viewing on misskey,
and scroll to that setting.

(This feature may be unstable depending on the device.)

Make sure to open this screen in the side panel of your browser.
Opening it in the side panel allows you to change settings
without interrupting Misskey's operation

Output the current settings as CSS code.
If you are using misskey from a browser on another device,
you can paste the output code into
'Settings ‚Üí General ‚Üí Custom CSS'
to use the same filtering settings.

(This will not work with third-party client apps.)

howto.text: This extension allows you to turn off posts and displays you don't want to see in Misskey and view them comfortably. It can do...

• Specific timeline settings
    You can set notes you want to hide for each TL.

• All TL filtering
    You can set notes you want to hide for all pages.

• Quick CSS
    Edit and turn on/off custom CSS in real time.

• Mute Seting
    You can hide various items except for notes.

• Other Setting
    You can configure detailed customization and extension settings.

other.lasttext: I am the sole developer of this extension. Sorry if it doesn't work.üòá
other.warning:
Please read

This extension not work.
If you are using firefox, you can change your settings to use it.

  • Type about:config in address bar
  • A warning message appears, ignore and continue.
  • Find setting: layout.css.has-selector.enabled
    • (Type in the textbox on the screen, it will come right up)
  • Double-click on the that and set the value to true
  • Restart Firefox
other.nooptions: If you add CSS from the settings, it will appear here.

title: QuickCSS Options
Always-ON CSS
text: If you write custom CSS here, you can turn it on and off at any time from the main screen. You can register up to 5 CSS.
The CSS described here is always valid. It will also be reflected in Misskey the moment it is entered.
usercssedit.supplementTltle: This setting should only be used if you know what it does.
usercssedit.supplementText:
This setting requires knowledge; if you do not know anything about CSS, we recommend that you do not use it.
The display may also be incorrect when Misskey is apped.
If the display is not correct, try turning this setting off

status.empty: Code is empty, Please enter code

disable.title: Not available on this page
disable.text: When you open Misskey, you will see the settings screen
